display.description: Registers the subscription for the NotifciationHubs resource provider and enables the creation of Namespaces and NotificationHubs
Unregisters the subscription for the NotifciationHubs resource provider and enables the creation of Namespaces and NotificationHubs
Returns a list of supported operations for Notification Hubs provider

display.operation: Operation results for Notification Hubs provider
display.description: Returns operation results for Notification Hubs provider
Get Namespace diagnostic settings
Create or Update Namespace diagnostic settings
Gets the available logs for Namespace
Checks whether or not a given Namespace resource name is available within the NotificationHub service.
Create a Namespace Resource and Update its properties. Tags and Capacity of the Namespace are the properties which can be updated.
Get the list of Namespace Resource Description
Delete Namespace Resource

display.operation: Create or Update Namespace Authorization Rules
display.description: Create a Namespace level Authorization Rules and update its properties. The Authorization Rules Access Rights, the Primary and Secondary Keys can be updated.
Get the list of Namespaces Authorization Rules description.
Get the list of Namespaces Authorization Rules description.
Delete Namespace Authorization Rule. The Default Namespace Authorization Rule cannot be deleted.
Get the Connection String to the Namespace
Namespace Authorization Rule Regenerate Primary/SecondaryKey, Specify the Key that needs to be regenerated
Checks whether or not a given NotificationHub name is available inside a Namespace.
Create a Notification Hub and Update its properties. Its properties mainly include PNS Credentials. Authorization Rules and TTL

display.operation: Get VAPID keys for a Notification Hub
display.description: Get new pair of VAPID keys for a Notification Hub
Get list of Notification Hub Resource Descriptions
Delete Notification Hub Resource

display.operation: Create or Update Notification hub Authorization Rule
display.description: Create Notification Hub Authorization Rules and Update its properties. The Authorization Rules Access Rights, the Primary and Secondary Keys can be updated.
Get the list of Notification Hub Authorization Rules
Get the list of Notification Hub Authorization Rules
Delete Notification Hub Authorization Rules
Get the Connection String to the Notification Hub

display.operation: Notification Hub Authorization Rule Regenerate Keys
display.description: Notification Hub Authorization Rule Regenerate Primary/SecondaryKey, Specify the Key that needs to be regenerated
Get All Notification Hub PNS Credentials. This includes, WNS, MPNS, APNS, GCM and Baidu credentials
Send a test push notification to 10 matched devices.
Get list of Namespace metrics Resource Descriptions

metricSpecifications.name: registration.all
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful registration operations (creations updates queries and deletions).

metricSpecifications.name: registration.create
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful registration creations.

metricSpecifications.name: registration.update
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful registration updates.

metricSpecifications.name: registration.get
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful registration queries.

metricSpecifications.name: registration.delete
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful registration deletions.

metricSpecifications.name: incoming
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful send API calls.

metricSpecifications.name: incoming.scheduled
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Scheduled Push Notifications Sent

metricSpecifications.name: incoming.scheduled.cancel
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Scheduled Push Notifications Cancelled

metricSpecifications.name: scheduled.pending
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Pending Scheduled Notifications

metricSpecifications.name: installation.all
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Installation Management Operations

metricSpecifications.name: installation.get
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Get Installation Operations

metricSpecifications.name: installation.upsert
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Create or Update Installation Operations

metricSpecifications.name: installation.patch
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Patch Installation Operations

metricSpecifications.name: installation.delete
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Delete Installation Operations

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.allpns.success
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful notifications.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.allpns.invalidpayload
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the PNS returned a bad payload error.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.allpns.pnserror
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because there was a problem communicating with the PNS (excludes authentication problems).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.allpns.channelerror
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the channel was invalid not associated with the correct app throttled or expired.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.allpns.badorexpiredchannel
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the channel/token/registrationId in the registration was expired or invalid.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.wns.success
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful notifications.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.wns.invalidcredentials
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the PNS did not accept the provided credentials or the credentials are blocked. (Windows Live does not recognize the credentials).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.wns.badchannel
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the ChannelURI in the registration was not recognized (WNS status: 404 not found).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.wns.expiredchannel
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the ChannelURI is expired (WNS status: 410 Gone).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.wns.throttled
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because WNS is throttling this app (WNS status: 406 Not Acceptable).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.wns.tokenproviderunreachable
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Windows Live is not reachable.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.wns.invalidtoken
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The token provided to WNS is not valid (WNS status: 401 Unauthorized).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.wns.wrongtoken
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The token provided to WNS is valid but for another application (WNS status: 403 Forbidden). This can happen if the ChannelURI in the registration is associated with another app. Check that the client app is associated with the same app whose credentials are in the notification hub.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.wns.invalidnotificationformat
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The format of the notification is invalid (WNS status: 400). Note that WNS does not reject all invalid payloads.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.wns.invalidnotificationsize
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The notification payload is too large (WNS status: 413).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.wns.channelthrottled
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The notification was dropped because the ChannelURI in the registration is throttled (WNS response header: X-WNS-NotificationStatus:channelThrottled).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.wns.channeldisconnected
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The notification was dropped because the ChannelURI in the registration is throttled (WNS response header: X-WNS-DeviceConnectionStatus: disconnected).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.wns.dropped
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The notification was dropped because the ChannelURI in the registration is throttled (X-WNS-NotificationStatus: dropped but not X-WNS-DeviceConnectionStatus: disconnected).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.wns.pnserror
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Notification not delivered because of errors communicating with WNS.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.wns.authenticationerror
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Notification not delivered because of errors communicating with Windows Live invalid credentials or wrong token.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.apns.success
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful notifications.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.apns.invalidcredentials
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the PNS did not accept the provided credentials or the credentials are blocked.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.apns.badchannel
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the token is invalid (APNS status code: 8).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.apns.expiredchannel
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of token that were invalidated by the APNS feedback channel.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.apns.invalidnotificationsize
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the payload was too large (APNS status code: 7).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.apns.pnserror
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because of errors communicating with APNS.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.gcm.success
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful notifications.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.gcm.invalidcredentials
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the PNS did not accept the provided credentials or the credentials are blocked.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.gcm.badchannel
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the registrationId in the registration was not recognized (GCM result: Invalid Registration).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.gcm.expiredchannel
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the registrationId in the registration was expired (GCM result: NotRegistered).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.gcm.throttled
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because GCM throttled this app (GCM status code: 501-599 or result:Unavailable).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.gcm.invalidnotificationformat
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the payload was not formatted correctly (GCM result: InvalidDataKey or InvalidTtl).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.gcm.invalidnotificationsize
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the payload was too large (GCM result: MessageTooBig).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.gcm.wrongchannel
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the registrationId in the registration is not associated to the current app (GCM result: InvalidPackageName).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.gcm.pnserror
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because of errors communicating with GCM.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.gcm.authenticationerror
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the PNS did not accept the provided credentials the credentials are blocked or the SenderId is not correctly configured in the app (GCM result: MismatchedSenderId).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.mpns.success
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of all successful notifications.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.mpns.invalidcredentials
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the PNS did not accept the provided credentials or the credentials are blocked.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.mpns.badchannel
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the ChannelURI in the registration was not recognized (MPNS status: 404 not found).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.mpns.throttled
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because MPNS is throttling this app (WNS MPNS: 406 Not Acceptable).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.mpns.invalidnotificationformat
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the payload of the notification was too large.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.mpns.channeldisconnected
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the ChannelURI in the registration was disconnected (MPNS status: 412 not found).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.mpns.dropped
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that were dropped by MPNS (MPNS response header: X-NotificationStatus: QueueFull or Suppressed).

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.mpns.pnserror
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because of errors communicating with MPNS.

metricSpecifications.name: outgoing.mpns.authenticationerror
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The count of pushes that failed because the PNS did not accept the provided credentials or the credentials are blocked.

metricSpecifications.name: notificationhub.pushes
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: All outgoing notifications of the notification hub

metricSpecifications.name: incoming.all.requests
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total incoming requests for a notification hub

metricSpecifications.name: incoming.all.failedrequests
metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total incoming failed requests for a notification hub
